actual_permissions.description: The permissions that were granted to the actor process. Recommended for [1]Page Allocate, [2]Page Modify, and [3]Page Delete.

requested_permissions.description: The permissions that were requested by the actor process. Recommended for [1]Page Allocate, [2]Page Modify, and [3]Page Delete.
requested_permissions.name: Requested Permissions

description: Memory Activity events report when a process performs internal memory allocation, modification, or other manipulation activities - such as a buffer overflow or turning off data execution protection (DEP) - that are not typical for a process.
name: Memory Activity
